CorrelogramIterator Data::correlogramIterator (Pair pair, ScaleMode scale, int binSize, int timeframe)

Detailed Description

Specialized iterator on the latest correlation data stored by a request of a correlationTread for a given pair of clusters.

The data correspond to the binSize and timeFrame specified by the correlationTread. Caution: in Qt graphical coordinate system, the Y axis is inverted (increasing downwards), thus a point (x,y) as to be drawn and tested as (x,-y). The value returns by the iterator is either the raw correlogram value or the values scaled either the maximum of the correlogram or the shoulder. The values return take the Qt graphical coordinate system into consideration, the ordinate coordinate is the opposite of the raw data.
